A simple token system for color, type, and spacing that stays coherent across pages.

A small set of tokens can make a multi-page site feel consistent even as content grows.

## Core tokens

- Type scale: two headline sizes, one body size.
- Color: one accent, two neutrals, subtle surface tint.
- Spacing: 4, 8, 12, 20, 32.

## Why it matters

Consistency reduces design debt and makes future updates faster.

Why it matters

Consistency reduces design debt and makes future updates faster.
A lightweight workflow to ship a portfolio project fast without losing quality.

I keep my projects small, clear, and shippable. The key is to split the work into tiny slices that can be tested and deployed quickly.

## What works for me

- Define outcomes, not tasks.
- Build a thin vertical slice first.
- Keep design tokens and components consistent.

## Next steps

If you are building your own portfolio, start with a clear navigation and a focused set of projects. The rest can grow later.
